title: Add a Shipping Template and related options
description: Adds a Shipping Template and related options.
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

fields.name: ShippingTemplateId
fields.description: The ID of the shipping template. Can be omitted if it is adding a template.

fields.name: HandlingTime
fields.description: Handling time of the Shipping Template

fields.name: HandlingTimeCutOff
fields.description: Handling time cut-off of the Shipping Template. It must be a 24-hour time in ISO 8601 extended format. E.g. for a cut-off time of 4:30 pm, this value should be "16:30" or "T16:30". Timezones and fractional seconds are not supported.

fields.name: IsOversized
fields.description: If the Shipping Template is oversized

fields.name: IsRestricted
fields.description: If the Shipping Template is restricted

fields.name: ShippingOptions
fields.description: List of Shipping Options related to the Shipping Template

fields.name: ShippingOptionId
fields.type:
ShippingOptionId 
 Integer (optional) 

Unique identifier of the Shipping Option



 Cost 
 Number (required) 

Cost of the Shipping Option



 CarrierProductId 
 Integer (required) 

Carrier Product related to the Shipping Option



 ShipToRegions 
 Collection of Integer (optional) 

List of Regions that the Shipping Option ships to. If none are provided, it will default to Nationwide.



 Addons 
 Collection of <ShippingOptionAddonRequest> (optional) 

List of Addons that are available to the Shipping Option






 CarrierAddonId 
 Integer (required) 

Identifier of the Carrier Addon



 AdditionalCost 
 Number (required) 

Additional cost of the addon

fields.name: ShippingOptionId
fields.description: Unique identifier of the Shipping Option

fields.name: CarrierProductId
fields.description: Carrier Product related to the Shipping Option

fields.name: ShipToRegions
fields.description: List of Regions that the Shipping Option ships to. If none are provided, it will default to Nationwide.

fields.name: Addons
fields.description: List of Addons that are available to the Shipping Option

fields.name: CarrierAddonId
fields.type:
CarrierAddonId 
 Integer (required) 

Identifier of the Carrier Addon



 AdditionalCost 
 Number (required) 

Additional cost of the addon

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: ShippingTemplateId
fields.description: The ID of the created shipping template.
